Botticelli

Checklist for Station 3 in Sorrento Room

  1. Check white table cloth on top is clean. Change it or flip it if needed. Remove crumbs.
  2. Leave the 4 big glass sugar bowls on top.
  3. On the right hand side 5 salt and pepper shakers.
  4. Make sure Oyster forks and teaspoons are not mixed.
  5. Open the drawer and check all cutlery topped up but not overflowed.
  6. Small and big candles should have been put away in the left hand side cupboard.
  7. Open a new Pack of Table Paper if the opened one is low.
  8. Shelves on the left hand side:
    • 2 rows of 2 stands each
    • A third of Churchill side plates, a third of small side plates, side bowls.
    • Quilted dinner napkins topped up
    • Dinner napkins topped up
    • 1 big tray, 2 small trays
